Make a Latex cventry entry

Source: R/latex_helpers.R
cventry.Rd

Make a Latex cventry entry

Usage

cventry(
  center = " ",
  lefttop = " ",
  righttop = " ",
  rightbottom = " ",
  leftbuttom = " "
)

Arguments

center

Param center.

lefttop

Param lefttop.

righttop

Param righttop.

rightbottom

Param rightbottom.

leftbuttom

Param leftbuttom.

Value

A chracter vector.

Examples

cventry(center = "Hallo", lefttop = "world")
#> \cventry{Hallo}{world}{ }{ }{ }
